}
$EF $FF $EC $EC
$F1 $05 $40 $00
#instruments
{
n1F $CE $73 $00 $00 $00
@10 $00 $00 $7F $0B $00
@6 $AF $6C $00 $03 $00
@3 $CD $74 $00 $0C $00
@1 $FE $EF $00 $03 $00
@4 $CB $8F $00 $03 $00
}
t23 ;t22 feels too slow. Can't do it between that
w160



#0
$F4 $02
@21
$FA $03 $7F
o2c32@23c+16r192
/r16
$FA $03 $00

o5d12c+8^32<b12r96>c+8^32c+32d12r96c+16c+16<b12r96>c+8^32
